articles.title: Musk says Saudi would fund Tesla take-private deal
articles.description: Tesla CEO seeks to explain tweet indicating funding had been arranged

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Aretha Franklin Seriously Ill: Report
articles.description: Franklin canceled planned concerts earlier this year after she was ordered by her doctor to stay off the road and rest up.

articles.author: Dan Sabbagh
articles.title: Corbyn: I was present at wreath-laying but don't think I was involved
articles.description: Labour leader questioned over event at Tunisian cemetery where Munich Olympics massacre group members are buried

articles.author: NHL.com
articles.title: Capitals to raise Stanley Cup banner on NBCSN's 'Wednesday Night Hockey'
articles.description: The Washington Capitals will raise their Stanley Cup championship banner on the debut of "Wednesday Night Hockey" on NBCSN prior to their game Oct. 3 against the Boston Bruins (7:30 p.m. ET).

articles.author: Adam Maguire
articles.title: Ulster Bank to sell non-performing loans worth €1.4bn
articles.description: Ulster Bank is to sell 5,200 non-performing mortgages to affiliates of so-called vulture fund Cerberus for €1.4 billion.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/richardhartleyparkinson
articles.title: Builder who 'caused £4,000,000 in revenge for not being paid' faces court
articles.description: He was charged with criminal damage after allegedly causing the destruction on the homes in Hertfordshire.

articles.author: Piyush Tripathi
articles.title: Sexual abuse rampant in 15 Bihar shelter homes: Report - Times of India
articles.description: India News: Muzaffarpur shelter home where 34 inmates were raped is not the only one in Bihar where sexual, mental and physical abuse was rampant. Tata Institute

articles.author: Jordan Fabian
articles.title: Trump lashes out at 'Wacky Omarosa'
articles.description: President Trump on Monday blasted former aide Omarosa Manigault Newman after she went on a media tour to promote her new book that calls the president a racist and an incompetent leader.

articles.author: Matthew Beedham
articles.title: Cryptocurrency exit scams have conned people out of almost $100M
articles.description: Almost $100 million in cryptocurrency has been stolen by exit sammers, as ICO tokens continue to plummet in value. Indeed, the figures suggest that ICO scams over the last two years total at least $96.8 million in value, according to data compiled by blockcha…

articles.author: Tyler Conway
articles.title: Woj: Carmelo Anthony to Sign 1-Year, $2.4M Rockets Contract on Monday
articles.description: The Melo-to-Houston saga is finally reaching its endpoint.    ESPN's  Adrian Wojnarowski  reported  Carmelo Anthony  plans to sign his one-year, $2.4 million contract with the  Rockets  on Monday...

articles.author: Herbie Teope
articles.title: Injuries: McCarron, Peterman OK after scare Sunday
articles.description: Buffalo Bills OC Brian Daboll said quarterbacks AJ McCarron and Nathan Peterman are available to practice Monday after suffering minor injuries on Sunday. Plus, other injuries we're monitoring.

articles.author: Jesse David Fox
articles.title: 9 Comedians Reveal Jokes They’d Like to Steal If They Could Get Away With It
articles.description: From the Good One podcast, John Mulaney, Patton Oswalt, and more on the joke they’d steal.

articles.author: Recode Staff
articles.title: Recode Daily: Why Facebook banned Alex Jones — and why Twitter didn’t
articles.description: Plus, Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund is in talks to help Elon Musk take Tesla private; back-to-school season means the newest ways for marketers to sell direct-to-kids; comedy on the road — and from robots.

articles.title: FinCen director: We Receive 1,500 Virtual Currency Complaints a Month
articles.description: The US Financial Crimes Enforcement Network (FinCEN) now receives over 1,500 Suspicious Activity Reports, which concern cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin, every month.

articles.author: Hayley Miller
articles.title: Top GOP Congressman's Son Gives Money To Democrat Running For Father's Seat
articles.description: Rep. Bob Goodlatte's (R-Va.) son is hoping to help turn Virginia blue in November.

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/richardhartleyparkinson
articles.title: Pensioner says holiday to Spain was ruined by 'too many spaniards'
articles.description: Freda Jackson asked why Spanish people can't go somewhere else for their holiday instead of Benidorm.

articles.title: Watch: Leftist Protesters Accuse Republicans, Democrats, Police of Genocide
articles.description: Leftist protesters accused both major U.S. political parties and the police – “the Klan in Blue” – of committing genocide during a counter-protest against the “Unite the Right 2” rally in Washington, DC, on Sunday.

articles.author: CBS/AP
articles.title: Church gunman Devin Kelley's wife says he cuffed her to bed, said he'd be "right back" before deadly rampage
articles.description: Danielle Kelley said her husband, Devin Kelley​, put their 2-year-old son in the bedroom and forced her into the bedroom

articles.title: Tom Steyer: Impeach Trump for ‘Corruption’
articles.description: Left-wing impeachment activist Tom Steyer believes Democrats should try to impeach President Donald Trump for “corruption” instead of anything related to “Russia collusion.”

articles.author: Tim Higgins
articles.title: Elon Musk: Saudi Fund Asked About Taking Tesla Private
articles.description: Tesla’s Elon Musk said he has been in talks with a Saudi Arabian sovereign-wealth fund about taking the electric-car maker private and believes two-thirds of current shareholders would remain with the company.
